name: ​City Avenger（Oculus Quest VR）
description:
City Avenger（Oculus Quest VR）

Here comes the VR action game who tells a revenge story! Framed by your commissioner, you swear to revenge. After a decade of hard training, you come back and implement your plan to destroy the sin city.

In this game, you need to turn your VR headset and using your gamepad to control the hero to beat these mafia and other bad guys. In city avenger you can use rifle, machine gun, rocket launcher and other very cool weapons, drive car, turret, tank , helicoper, etc.You can enter bullettime to killing tons of badguys in a second, and you can roll over a tank in a single jump. You can blow up bad guys, car, house even skycraper, in another words, you can blow up everything in the game. 

Most Exciting In CityAvenger

1. 300 acres of game scene for you to explore.
2. Aim your enemy with your headset, easy and accurate.
3. Use Ak-47, Rocket Launcher, and many other powerful weapons to destroy your enemies.
4. Drive Ferrari 911, Mammoth Tank, Apache and many other awesome vehicles.
5. Destruct everything in the game like tanker or CBD and release your fury!
6. Do cool motions like kill your enemy one by one while roll in the air and initiate bullet-time.
